source: GDELT 2.1 Doc API (Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone)

fields.metadata.query: Search query used to filter events
fields.metadata.timeframe: Date range of the query (2025-01-01 to 2025-12-31)
fields.metadata.generated_at: ISO 8601 timestamp when the data was fetched
fields.metadata.note: Clarification that events are top article titles, not sentiment scores
fields.weekly_events[].events: Array of notable events for that week
fields.weekly_events[].events[].title: Article or event headline title
fields.weekly_events[].events[].sourcecountry: Country code of the article source
fields.weekly_events[].events[].seendate: Date when the article was observed by GDELT

notes: Contains 245 notable news events across 53 weeks of 2025, organized by week. Events are top article titles per week from GDELT's monitoring of US-related global news coverage. Used by the one-year and weekly-searches visualizations.
